title: Did President Donald Trump Overturn Farm Water Regulations, Causing an E. Coli Outbreak?
subtitle: A viral tweet misrepresented the nature (and consequences) of a bureaucratic decision made by the Food and Drug Administration in September 2017.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: An autumn 2018 outbreak of E. coli linked to romaine lettuce was caused by a decision by President Trump to reverse existing rules on agricultural water inspection.
